Description.Text: Opened in August 2016, V Fizeaustraat hotel will be located in a beautifully designed building close to Amstel Station in Amsterdam's up and coming neighborhoods of the East, with views over the Amstel river skyline. The new hotel will have 4.5 stars, 91 rooms, a contemporary 70s vibe, an unconventional but beautiful design, and will include breakfast and free wifi. To complete the stay, there is a special culinary lobby-The Lobby Fizeaustraat- which will be open for breakfast, lunch, dinner and everything in between for Amsterdammers as well as hotel gusts. The cafe-restaurant-bar will also include a terrace, a private dining space and the inspiring Palm Room in the basement - a place where you can expect events from book presentations to music acts - always giving you something new to look forward to during your next stay.
